IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDesc: PRIVATE ELEMENTARY SCHOOL FOR ECONOMICALLY, ACADEMICALLY, AND SOCIALLY AT RISK CHILDREN.
IRS990.MissionDesc: PRIVATE ELEMENTARY SCHOOL FOR ECONOMICALLY, ACADEMICALLY AND SOCIALLY AT RISK CHILDREN IN GRADES THREE THROUGH EIGHT.
IRS990.Desc: PRIVATE ELEMENTARY SCHOOL WHICH IS DEDICATED TO EDUCATING CHILDREN IN GRADES THREE THROUGH EIGHT WHOSE LIFE OPPORTUNITIES ARE LIMITED BY FINANCIAL, SOCIAL, AND ACADEMIC CHALLENGES AND WHOSE PARENTS/GUARDIANS DESIRE, BUT CAN NOT AFFORD A CATHOLIC EDUCATION. THE ACADEMY PROVIDES SMALL CLASSES, AN EXTENDED DAY AND YEAR, AND THE ACADEMIC, SOCIAL, AND SPRITUAL SUPPORTS NECESSARY FOR STUDENTS TO BECOME SUCCESSFUL PEOPLE AND LIFELONG LEARNERS.

BusinessName.BusinessNameLine1Txt: MARIA WALKER PRESIDENT LA SALLE ACADEMY

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE ENDOWMENT FUNDS ARE RESTRICTED AND REQUIRE THE ACADEMY TO CONTINUE ITS PRIMARY MISSION OF PROVIDING EDUCATIONAL ASSISTANCE TO EXTREMELY NEEDY CHILDREN. BEGINNING IN THE YEAR ENDED JUNE 30, 2012, OR THE FOURTH YEAR OF THE ENDOWMENT PLAN, THE ACADEMY MAY MAKE WITHDRAWALS TO PAY EXPENSES FOR OPERATING AND MAINTAINING THE SCHOOL. THE WITHDRAWAL AMOUNT IS LIMITED TO 5% OF THE PRINCIPAL OF THE ENDOWMENT AS OF THE FIRST DAY OF THE FISCAL YEAR. PER THE TERMS OF THE AGREEMENT, INCOME EARNED BY THE ENDOWMENT WILL BE DEEMED ADDED TO THE PRINCIPAL AMOUNT EACH YEAR. DURING THE YEARS ENDED JUNE 30, 2023 AND 2022, $-0- AND $154,874, RESPECTIVELY, WAS WITHDRAWN FROM THE ENDOWMENT AS PERMITTED BY THE AGREEMENT. AT JUNE 30, 2023, A CUMULATIVE TOTAL OF $396,565 HAS BEEN WITHDRAWN FROM THE ENDOWMENT.

THE ACADEMY IS A NOT-FOR-PROFIT ORGANIZATION THAT IS EXEMPT FROM INCOME TAXES UNDER SECTION 501 (C) (3) OF THE INTERNAL REVENUE CODE, AND CLASSIFIED BY THE INTERNAL REVENUE SERVICE AS OTHER THAN A PRIVATE FOUNDATION. THE COMMONWEALTH OF PENNSYLVANIA ALSO RECOGNIZES THE ACADEMY AS TAX-EXEMPT. ACCORDINGLY, NO PROVISION FOR INCOME TAXES IS MADE IN THE FINANCIAL STATEMENTS. THE ACADEMY BELIEVES THAT IT HAS APPROPRIATE SUPPORT FOR ANY TAX POSITIONS TAKEN, AND AS SUCH, DOES NOT HAVE ANY UNCERTAIN TAX POSITIONS THAT ARE MATERIAL TO THE FINANCIAL STATEMENTS. THE ACADEMY IS NO LONGER SUBJECT TO INCOME TAX EXAMINATIONS BY THE INTERNAL REVENUE SERVICE FOR YEARS ENDING BEFORE JUNE 30, 2020.
STUDENTS ARE WELCOME FROM ALL RACIAL AND ETHNIC COMMUNITIES WITHIN THE PHILADELPHIA REGION. NO BIAS IS PERMITTED BASED ON RACE OR NATIONAL ORIGIN. ALL PUBLICATIONS CLEARLY STATE THIS POLICY.
REPORTING NUMBER OF CONTRIBUTIONS RATHER THAN ITEMS CONTRIBUTED

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION A, LINE 2
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: JIM AND KATHY LYNCH ARE HUSBAND AND WIFE.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 11B
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE FINANCE COMMITTEE REVIEWS THE FORM 990 WITH THE TAX PREPARER, AND AFTER THEY ARE SATISFIED IT HAS BEEN PROPERLY AND COMPLETELY PREPARED, THEY SUBMIT FORM 990 TO THE ENTIRE BOARD OF TRUSTEES FOR APPROVAL. UPON THE BOARD'S REVIEW IT IS THEN SIGNED AND MAILED TO THE IRS.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 12C
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: MONITORED BY EXECUTIVE COMMITTEE THROUGH ANNUAL SURVEY.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 15
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE COMPENSATION FOR THE PRESIDENT EMERITA CONSISTED OF A STIPEND PAID TO HER RELIGIOUS COMMUNITY. THE SALARY FOR THE PRINCIPAL IS SET BY THE PRESIDENT IN CONSULTATION WITH THE FINANCE COMMITTEE OF THE BOARD OF TRUSTEES.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION C, LINE 19
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: GOVERNING DOCUMENTS, FINANCIAL STATEMENTS AND FORM 990 ARE MADE AVAILABLE UPON REQUEST.
